item.description: #internetContent #philosophy/nietzsche The Portable Nietzsche by Walter Kaufmann: This is a collection of Nietzsche’s most important writings, edited and translated by one of the leading experts on Nietzsche.

item.title: Is Nietzsche an existentialist
item.description: #internetContent #existentialism #philosophy/nietzsche related notes: [[Nietzsche - Self-overcoming]] Whether Nietzsche is an existentialist is a matter of debate. Some scholars argue that he is, while others contend that he is not.

item.title: Nietzsche's Idea of Eternal Recurrence - thoughtco
item.description: #internetContent #philosophy/nietzsche #existentialism Article link: Nietzsche’s Idea of Eternal Return related notes: [[Is Nietzsche an existentialist]] [[Nietzsche - Self-overcoming]] [[Getting started with Nietzsche’s Philosophy]] Eternal recurrence is the philosophical concept that everything that has happened will happen again, an infinite number of times.
